name: Memory Loss
description: Memory Loss is a fast-finishing 70% sativa hybrid from Archive Seed Bank that smells very much like a Dutch Haze, with a strong, peppery incense odor and undertones of bubblegum and fruit. This cross of Amnesia Haze and a Face Off OG male produces large, easy to grow plants and heavy yields. Memory Loss is named for its mind-warping high that can leave users in a disoriented and forgetful mental state.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Happy, Talkative, Focused, Creative, Stress, Depression, Pain, Fatigue, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Headache
